questions.prompt: A youth known for his beauty, who is loved by aphrodite, the greek goddess of love. he is killed by a wild boar, and a flower grows from his blood.?
Who escapes from burning troy, wanders for years, and ends up in italy then is revered as an ancestral hero of the romans.?
Grandson of sisyphus and legendary hero of corinth. he catches the winged horse pegasus and uses this mythological creature to help him slay the fire-breathing chimaera.?
Whose wife and her lover kills this person in his bathtub becasue he killed his daughter?
Who, to gain a fair wind for his troops, he sacrifices his own daughter, iphigenia, to artemis;?
Whose mother forgot to dip their heel in the river styx and thus only has one weakness?
Who slayed hector because he slayed patroclus?
Who quarrels with agamemnon over a slave girl and withdraws from the war.?
Son of peleus and thetis and famed leader of the myrmidons who fights for the greeks in the trojan war.?
